content: the kathy dishcloth is named in honor of a delightful student in the crochet class i teach at my church designed with simplicity in mind the kathy dishcloth offers a quick and easy crochet experience while using some fun stitches it looks great in any color combination making it a stylish and practical addition to your kitchen or bath essentials it also makes a great gift for family and friends and it s sure to be a hot seller at your next market ***materials*** **➤yarn ** 100% cotton i used lily sugar n cream **➤yardage ** 50-60 yds **➤hooks ** 5 0 mm *contact the designer https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles* this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2024
